website_summaries.verdict: Excellent quality sheets that you'll love sleeping on but that won't break the bank.
pros: Percale weave for a matte finish
The sheets are thick and comfortable
They get softer with each wash
cons: Limited colors and a little more expensive than other brands

customer_reviews.title: delightful and a joy to sleep in year after year
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the kind of percale sheets my grandmother used. Crisp, delightful and a joy to sleep in year after year. When I read the reviews online for these sheets I noticed several comments about them feeling scratchy at first, so I purchased them with a bit of trepidation. However when they arrived, beautifully packaged I might add, I found them to be exactly what I was looking for. They are the best. Their crispness is not scratchy at all, they have an amazing feel night after night. They feel special. I'll be spreading the word and saving up to buy another set. Thank you for the great quality.
customer_reviews.author: jizzlejazz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: After the large number of positive reviews and almost perfect rating, I had a lot of hope for these sheets. I should have known better. These are awful. I have tired a number of different sheets through the years at a lot of different quality levels. I have even tried the cheap generic box store sheets and those blew these out of the water. I figured these would get better with wear and washes. No luck. We just purchased a new King bed, standard height (non-pillow top) and the fitted sheet repeatedly comes off the corners. TL;DR: Poor quality fabric and feel, sizing is not correct for a standard mattress let alone pillow tops.
customer_reviews.author: HSea

customer_reviews.title: 2nd wash color faded
customer_reviews.text: Only the second wash and color faded. Otherwise seem ok, definitely not luxurious category. Wrinkles are terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, affordable, beautiful packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've washed these sheets once and slept on them for about a week now, so take my review with a grain of salt. But the packaging was beautiful (see pictures), and these sheets are extremely thick and CRISP. Comparable to the markedly more expensive ones I got from my mother-in-law from a place that rhymes with "snottery yarn."
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced cheaply-made sheets
customer_reviews.text: Basic percale sheets. But are they worth the price? Not really. They are very basic percale. Not the worst sheets I've slept on, but not the best either. Pockets aren't particularly deep. 1/4 inch elastic in a casing on the fitted sheet. I've spent less money on better constructed sheets that feel amazing. These sheets are pricey and nothing special .
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhhh!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I could fall in love with bed sheets. It was instant too ha! The moment I laid on my bed, Ohhhhhhh! They really do feel crispy yet soft. Also, they are breathable and cool to the touch. These are not your typical discount sheets.I never thought I would pay $100 for bed sheets but after some research on bedding, I decided to take a chance. I will certainly buy another 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, soft and cool. Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not sure about these sheets, but after a couple of washes I quickly fell in love with them. Crisp, cool and soft all at the same time. Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: KimD57

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: The sheets were beautifully packaged when they arrived and I was SO excited but they so unbelievably thin, Haven’t even had these for two months and there is already a massive hole! The material is almost disintegrating it’s very Weird. And trust me, I’ve had Very cheap sheets that have lasted YEARS without tearing, this is not normal. Shame I can’t return because it’s been two weeks past the return window so now I’m out 120$. I’ll never spend this much money on sheets again unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Lopez

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE these sheets
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these sheets. They are exactly what we expected in regard to the look and feel of percale. They just get softer and softer with every wash and I find eat easier to remove and stain free after washing compared to treated sheets. I just wish that they offer a bigger pocket option on the fitted sheet. We have a fairly thick mattress and a latex topper on it as well. So at least a 17 inch pocket fitted sheet would be ideal. Other than that, they are a spectacular product for the price point. The packaging and customer service were also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not Crisp Like High end Hotel Sheets
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for hotel quality , crisp white sheets then you may be disappointed. . I have the sheets in the washer right now . Upon opening the package the sheets have a smooth satine fell . I will post an update after a few nights sleeping on them . No rating at the moment .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb product!
customer_reviews.text: There is so much deception in today's linens market. Misleading thread counts, odd sizing, poor quality fabric. I am happy to say this sheet set is fabulous! The company that sells them really cares about their product and their customers. They came beautifully packaged, and washed up like a dream (take good care of fine linens and do not use hot water or blazing hot dryers). I have paid substantially more for pima cotton sheets but these surpassed my rigorous standards for crispness, finishing and size. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MVH

customer_reviews.title: Fine silky cotton sheets
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. The sheets feel so soft and silky. They washed up nicely. I also liked how the company packaged the sheets. They enclosed the sheets in a beautiful cotton print bag. The packaging was as if I was receiving a fine gift. I have been enjoying the sheets. Since they are cotton, they do wrinkle a bit. Since I am not into ironing, the wrinkles stay . However, the sheets are still looking alright. Most important to me is they are still beautiful to touch. The company is very welcoming and as a customer I like how they go the extra mile. I am so glad I purchased the sheet. fine quality.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Itchy and irritating
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m sensitive but I could not sleep on these sheets. They made me itchy. I laundered them put them on the bed thinking they seemed fine but ended up stripping the bed after midnight as they were keeping me awake. So itchy! I just sent them back and paid more than $30 to send. Sad purchase. Do your research!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft And A Bit Rough
customer_reviews.text: I had hopes for these sheets based on all of the good reviews. They came packaged beautifully which was already a good sign. They felt okay when I took them out. I washed them and dried as instructed and made my bed. Fitted sheet went over my 16" mattress with no problem. But overall, I found the sheets and the pillow cases to be slightly rough, not soft at all. I've read that some percale sheets need several washings to bring out the softness of the fabric. I'll give it about 3 - 4 more washes and update if they feel any softer. But for now, the search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Vicunia

customer_reviews.title: Realized I don't like this crisp of sheet actually but very good quality and nice packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive sheets I have ever bought. I am not sure if I like how crisp they feel actually. I like the softer cotton for sleeping. These wash up extremely well unlike the micro fiber ones I have bought before, I will see how I like them after a couple months and update. Never thought of sheets too much till now. There is a difference. If you like crisper and a bit heavier sheets, these are really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchberry

customer_reviews.title: COLOR IS NOT TRUE TO PHOTO
customer_reviews.text: Although I liked the texture, quality, and packaging of these sheets, the color was way off. I ordered burgundy but it's more like a dark rust, bordering on orange. If color doesn't matter, these are nice sheets. In the photo, a burgundy skirt is on the right (sorry--I haven't ironed it yet) and the sheets are on the left. This photo looks true to color on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: My Experience

customer_reviews.title: The color is nothing like the image
customer_reviews.text: The color is nothing like the image. I ordered Latte and what I received looks like Ivory. Will most likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Need to know

customer_reviews.title: Baaaaaad quality control.  Really, really bad.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these sheets in preparation for the arrival of new guest room furniture. I would like to give you a good review on this sheet set but I can’t. Out if 4 total pieces we should have gotten with this Queen set, we received only the top sheet and one pillow case. The top sheet and pillow case SEEM okay...but apparently they got together and ate the bottom sheet and other pillow case. Ugh. Giving Amazon the chance to replace, but I get the feeling the next batch won’t be much better. For $100, you expect at least a modicum of quality control....
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dang good
customer_reviews.text: I like crispy sheets and am in constant search for the perfect crisp, smooth, thick old fashioned cotton sheets that were the norm 50 years ago. I’ve tried luxury to Target in this search. These don’t rise to that level, but they are pretty good. My only real complaint is they could use better elastic to keep the fitted sheet really snug on the mattress. It comes loose at night and needs a smooth and tuck each day to keep from bunching up. I’d consider buying again when these wear out, but I will probably continue my search for the perfect crispy cotton percale sheet with my next purchase. They are good sheets for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my perfect summer sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Love these sheets. I know they are just sheets but.... they are perfect for me. Soft, smooth, crisp and cool. (Important for us women of a certain age.😄)Very generously sized almost too big and that is going over a queen pillowtop with a 3 inch memory foam topper. Plenty of room to spare. They do wrinkle a bit but smooth out nicely when I make the bed in the morning. Elegant and lovely packaging not your standard clear plastic zipper bag. I will be buying another set! I might even buy a set as a wedding present... they are definitely a luxury gift.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, too small
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a ton for sheets, so I gave these a try. You get what you pay for. These sheets were scratchy, thin and too small for my king sized bed. They bottom sheet was supposed to be deep pocket, but they barely stretched over and popped up all the time. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rex The TV Terrier

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets despite the price because nice cotton sheets are so hard to find. I was soooo disappointed. The top hem of the flat sheet will not lay flat because it was sewn crooked. The pillow cases are twisted for the exact same reason. For this price, these "luxury" sheets should be perfectly sewn! I tossed the sheets in the dryer after washing and hung them outside on the line to dry. They do wrinkle easily, but hanging them to dry lessened the wrinkles. I do like the comfort of the cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hollobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sheets but don’t fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These are packaged just beautifully. They feel cool and crisp. I washed them right away on cold and I’m not seeing anything more than regular slight wrinkling. They feel like good quality sheets. I was a little disappointed they just barely cover my queen size bed. The pockets don’t completely cover the mattress on the sides. And the top sheet...I can’t tuck it in at all on the sides. The length is fine, however. As I said, they feel very nice but they are just a little thinner than I usually get. Even though I like them, I would probably never order again due to not fitting exactly right.
customer_reviews.author: LeeRo

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Sheets. Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Although the sheets are pricey, they are exceptional. And compared to other famous expensive sheet brands (I can currently think of two different companies, both beginning with “B”), the cost of these sheets is 1/3 the price. They are sturdy, but have incredible softness and body. They get better and better with each washing. Wash in cold and tumble dry low. You won’t regret this luxury purchase. I have bought a dozen sets for myself and for gifts over the past few months.
customer_reviews.author: faysquared

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets because the reviews looked good. When I received them I washed and dried them according to manufacturer’s recommendations. The sheets were soft but appeared wrinkled and thinner then I expected. After normal use and laundering weekly, following manufacturers guidelines, they began to tear as though they were dry rotted. I called Amazon to requested a refunded which they granted but charged me a $23 restocking fee. I would not recommend these sheets to anyone. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hensler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy after over a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Had this sheet set for over a year now. If you love cotton sheets, these are very comfortable. I've seen some reviews indicating color fastness, but I have not had any problem myself. I ordered the ivory sheets, and they are holding up well after a full year of nightly use and wash approximately every 2 weeks. One of the sheets has just a little bit of a frayed edge, but otherwise they are intact. They are crisp and cool sheets, and are great for the desert southwest.
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Really terrible sheets. It's very very difficult to place credulity ...
customer_reviews.text: Really terrible sheets. It's very very difficult to place credulity to the good reviews posted. The sheets are gritty and scratchy feeling - it just doesn't seem possible they're 100% organic cotton percale. I had to return these sheets, we couldn't sleep on them. A positive addition; the sheets fit very well especially the fitted bottom sheet with the elastic band all around the perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: Kannl

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble finding good sheets for me. Most sheets I've had make my ankles very itchy, all most burning at times. (I have sensitive skin on my ankles or something.) I have to have Cotton sheets and all the ones I've found are to scratchy or something because they would make my ankles itchy, then I tried these sheets and they don't itch any more. They are very smooth and crisp, very good quality sheets and very nice packaging. I plan on getting another pair soon! I would recommend them to anyone and to people with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: misterx

customer_reviews.title: Soft & crisp.  Wash up nice. Cool
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets EVER. I wish they weren’t so expensive, but considering 1/3 of our lives are in bed then they are worth every penny. They are soft but crisp. They keep my husband cool throughout the night. They wash up nice. I don’t use softener in the dryer and they come out a little wrinkled. Once on the bed the wrinkles disappear. You can turn over in bed without the sheets sticking to you! I would like them to come in a few more colors, but overall I would highly recommend these! I won’t be buying any other sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Millen

customer_reviews.title: Cool, crisp, fast feel, premium sheets
customer_reviews.text: Cool, crisp, fast feel premium sheets are here. Coming from a hospitality background (B&B manager), I'd put these in every room. They are not inexpensive, but they are exactly what I was looking for. Totally worth it. I ordered the burgundy color, which seems true and rich.
customer_reviews.author: Asbian Colderion

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: OK, so they are a bit more wrinkly than the sateen sheets. Not an issue with me. These have that crisp feeling that is much more comfortable than the 600+ thread count junk available at local stores. They are sewn well and the material appears and feels to be of high quality. More than anything else, it's the PERCALE weave that sets these sheets in a class of their own. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as it claims
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return these sheets. They aren't as soft as I hoped they would be. I've washed them 4 times and they still have a scratchiness to them that I'm not happy about. They seem to be good quality and that they'll last, I just wish they would be softer. They'll be the spare set for now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: I'm no sheet expert, but these make me think my old ones were made of broken glass. Arrived surprisingly fast as well. Well worth the price. Even the packaging was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for the money- Percale is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Percale sheets aren’t known to be wrinkle free or known for softness. If that’s what you want, look at something else. Percale Cotton is known for its coolness and they don’t pill up after washings. They are like grandmas sheets she hung on the clothes line. I can’t stand the Egyptian Cotton sheets they make that after washings they pill and get bumpy- for this reason. Percale is the answer. Love these- great for the money and good weight material- not thin.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding comfort, durability and value.
customer_reviews.text: OMG these sheets far exceeded expectations and the bar is fairly high. My wife had recently bought a set oof Bolle & Branch which granted are extremely well made and comfortable, but also quite pricey-particularly for California King. I didn’t want to spend that much again on a 2nd set which is when I found these. They’re both luxurious to sleep on after being freshly laundered and ironed (no starch) - while there’s no comparison between the Bolle and Branch, these are a top contender - certainly 5 star hotel quality and simply outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Made n’ Maryland

customer_reviews.title: THESE SHEETS FEEL LIKE SANDPAPER
customer_reviews.text: When the sheets arrived I was so excited; they felt silky smooth when I took them out of the package. As directed, I washed the sheets in cold water with a mild detergent and tumble-dried them on low. When they came out of the dryer, they felt like SANDPAPER. I'm outraged over the false advertising, and am returning the sheet today. I don't care if they're washed, they'd better refund my money. I can't afford to speak over $100 on sheets that are CRAP. I was hard=pressed to even give these sheets one star...they don't deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Koester

customer_reviews.title: I want these for all my beds
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These sheets feel wonderful. I ordered queen size. My mattress is 12 inches thick and I got a generous drop on both sides of the bed. These were for the guest room, but they are so soft and nice that I think I may move in and be the guest. I washed them before I put them on the bed and they came out of the dryer in really nice condition. I chose ivory and the color is soft and pretty. I plan to buy a set for my king size bed also.
customer_reviews.author: hpm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Crinkly & Not Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: It's a thick cotton - but even after washing it doesn't feel very soft. I presume over time it will soften up - but unlike others [like Boll & Branch] that come out of the box soft, these aren't. And they're wrinkly and oddly noisy - which may disturb sleep with someone else, but presumably not yourself. Well constructed, and a good value for the price - it's just not the sheets I was hoping for, i.e. smooth, soft and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Beyond

customer_reviews.title: These Are The Ritz You've Been Searching For !
customer_reviews.text: #1 Period If You Like The Best And These Are Indeed The Best Period ! Have Ordered 12 Sets Just In The Last 6 Weeks ! They Are The Ritz Carlton Of Sheets ! I Do Know Angels, In My Bed At Night When I Retire For Sleep ! YES Just For Me, I Order A Brand New Set Every 5-6 Days. These Are The 2500 Thread Count That I Was Searching For. Best Period Peru Pima 415 Percale ! And, There Not The High Thread Count That I Was Searching World Wide For ! It's Peru Cotton - It's Percale - It's Just Heaven ! SERIOUSLY ! Sincerely D.K.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are AMAZING! After receiving these I immediately purchased the duvet cover as well Cool, Crisp , Soft seriously you should treat yourself The price is almost unbelievable it’s such a good deal We have multiple sets from Frette and I feel like these are even better Quality Glad I found this company and will continue to build my collection Can you please start doing more stripes 😉
customer_reviews.author: Dstar

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! I prefer crisp sheets (like the kind we used to bring in off the clothesline). I've searched for a long time and am extremely happy with these. I went to a department store recently telling the salesperson I was looking for crisp sheets.... she said "hmmmm...crispy sheets? If you like "crispy" sheets you can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very, very nice pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely pillowcases. Soft, fine cotton fabric with a bit of crispness and nice bright white color (but not that bluish "optic" white). I want another pair but they're not available now - hoping they come back! Wash up nicely with minimal wrinkling for natural cotton. I bought King size for our queen sized pillows and just tuck the whole end up inside for a neat look. These are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Green bean

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are great sheets. The packaging it came in was very nice but simple. It was also easy to open unlike some products. The sheets were a little lighter in color than I thought but I still kept them. Put them in the wash when I got them and on the bed that night. They are crisp yet soft. Breathable yet have a little weight to them. These are my new everyday sheets until it gets cold. We will have to see how durable they are but they appear to be durasble. My initial thought is that I think these are a good value for the money but that will depend on how they wear.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION ON THE ACTUAL SIZE OF THESE  SHEETS.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for a full size bed. The bottom fitted sheet in this set is way too big for my full size not very old mattress. It's way to big even if I enclose the box springs when I make my bed. Don't know what full size beds measure in Peru but U.S. sizing is really pretty uniform. It would have been nice if this hadn't happened. My fault because I didn't try them out before my return date expired.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Head

customer_reviews.title: Perfect percale!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are fantastic. I love percale. They are not wrinkle free but that's the nature of percale sheets. And it's certainly not a deal breaker for me. I just bought some percale pillowcases from a different company and they are not as soft and silky and crisp as these are. Long staple cotton is essential. Egyptian or Pima is essential. I would highly recommend these sheets and I will spread the word to my friends that these are exceptional. The price is great too. Shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful sheets. the fabric softens over some washing time, but I love it just being washed once now. Ample sheet size for my 13 in. mattress size (total size with pad). I am happy to know no chemicals are used in the growing of the cotton, that was important when I purchased these, and the price is right. I will purchase more in the future. I like the pima percale over sateen, which is too warm for summer.
customer_reviews.author: LU

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Night's Sleep
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on sheets that held us hostage because of their clinginess, these sheets allow us to slip into and slip out of bed at our own choosing. We sleep better, longer and are able to turn and snuggle without pulling a muscle in clingy sheets. I'm going to order from this company again. A bonus is the packaging. Very deliberate with making these sheets look as special as they feel. A wonderful gift for a bridal shower or wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susie D.

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much I bought another set in two ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked them so much I bought another set in two weeks. Pima cotton is soft, comfortable, breathable, and durable. The letter from the company was a very nice personal touch. Buy these sheets today. Come back tomorrow and buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Yack

customer_reviews.title: So Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these sheets. The quality is very good. The only problem I seem to have is the pockets on the fitted sheet are just a tiny bit short. They do make it under the mattress, but usually one corner pops up. I don't find it a big deal because I always pull my sheets tight when making the bed...I still give this product a 4. Would love to know if you make deeper pocket depths. These are 14"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% cotton?! REALLY? Hot and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned as I opened the Amazon delivery box containing the sheet set due to what seemed the odor or smell of cloth impregnated formaldehyde and a sheen reminiscent of rayon. As quickly as prudence would allow I washed the set and fitted them to my bed. Unhappily the sheets had the comfort more resembling the comfort one might expect from rayon, ie uncomfortably hot, rather than breathable, luxurious, high thread count 100% cotton sheets. To all who suffer hot summers and wish the comfort of well fabricated cotton sheets, pass on these. Honesty in advertising may be an issue where these sheets are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: tpatadon

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle even on high heat, not that soft
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to have nice sheets in the guest room, and didn’t want to believe the other reviews that they came out of the washing machine completely wrinkled. I washed on cold, dried on med high heat, and they are not only wrinkled as can be, they’re not the luxurious Pima cotton feel I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of sheets from Peru Pima. If you want high quality, hotel luxury sheets look no further because this is it. The packaging is very nice. I have never had issues. They launder very well. They have my business for good. The customer support is awesome as well if you have questions or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: After 30 years I finally found the sheets for me
customer_reviews.text: If you like crisp and cool sheets these are perfect. I'm sick of the micro sheer that we could not escape I've found the perfect sheets. From time to time a hotel I was staying at would have thst perfect combination of clean, cool and crispy sheets. Made me want to steal them because every set I bought and had high hopes for never stood up well. Thus I have a closet full of failures. Buy these asap
customer_reviews.author: bigdeal

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, crisp, comfortable sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very high quality cotton and well constructed. They do wrinkle, since they're 100% cotton, but not enough to make them uncomfortable when laid out on the bed. The pillowcases fit my pillows perfectly, and the top sheet is sized well to cover my full-sized mattress. The fitted sheet has pockets deep enough for my thick mattress and memory foam topper. My only complaint is that the full-sized fitted sheet is about two inches too long for the mattress. I've found, though, that I can tuck it in firmly enough that it stays in place when I sleep on it, so I'm not considering this a deal breaker, just the loss of a star in the rating!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Morse

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find the right sheets. I don't like sateen or microfiber or those rated at 1000 thread count and while I have found some sheets that feel good they are very thin. These are thick. They feel the way I think crisp bedding sheets should feel. Happy sleeper!
customer_reviews.author: Benji9999

customer_reviews.title: I'm a linen snob and I LOVE these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy my sheets from well known and expensive stores and I don't mind paying the money as long as they are great quality and last. I got these sheets a couple of weeks ago and I love them! Unless something goes crazy after months of use and washing I have to say these are AWESOME sheets and the price....is excellent (I typically pay that much for one sheet). If you love percale, you will love these sheets and you have to remember, good sheets get better (softer) with use and proper washing. I will be replacing my old sheets and buying these in other colors!!
customer_reviews.author: loriewithae

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect.
customer_reviews.text: When I buy sheets, I look for thread count over 300 and 100% cotton. This is my second set of this product. I've been using my first set for over a year very happily. I needed to replace an older set of sheets and there was no question about what sheets I would buy. These sheets line dry to a comfortable soft smooth crisp.
customer_reviews.author: AC enjoying a good read

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and smooth- great sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased lots of sheets recently looking for "the perfect sheet". Egyptian cotton were very thick, but unbelievably rough. Bamboo were wonderfully soft, but totally limp. I wanted crisp, and smooth. These sheets satisfied that. I am very happy. They wrinkle some, but flatten out nicely on the bed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. I've always been happiest with percale sheets and the thread count on these is perfect = they wash and dry well and I find no reason to have to iron them. A little wrinkled when first out of the dryer but smooth out after putting them on the bed - crisp feeling and cool, just what I like. I ordered the second set just to make sure I had them on hand before they might possibly be out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Greer

customer_reviews.title: TRUE percale COOL and CRISP!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sheets! Believe me, I ordered and returned four other bed sheet sets (overstock, etc) because they were either too hot or stayed wrinkled terribly. These nautical blue strip sheets are COOL and CRISP and are true percale. It's really difficult to find TRUE percale sheets!!! BUY THESE and you wont be disappointed. I ordered another set for my Cal-King bed too 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: lmorby

customer_reviews.title: Quality matches the price
customer_reviews.text: I washed the sheets and used them now for several nights. They do come out of the drier very wrinkled but they are cotton so that was expected and not a concern for me. Im not about to iron them. They are cool and breath great. I have enjoyed them. Ordered burgundy which is lighter then expected, more rust or brick. While I think I will wait a month to confirm my initial assestment before buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Flawlessly beautiful sheets
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sheets. So glad to have found pima percale sheets since I find sateen a very poor substitute for bedding (pills terribly). I usually purchase two sets and sew the two top sheets together to make a duvet. This gives me two bottom sheets to work with, extra pillow cases and a nice duvet. Sewing sheets together usually reveals the flaws and irregularities of the weave, but these are some of the most beautifully made and nearly flawless sheets I've ever worked with. My husband - who loves crisp sheets - rated them 11 on a 10 point scale.
customer_reviews.author: MAdS

customer_reviews.title: What I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews, I didn’t know what expect. I was looking for that old fashioned, cool, crisp, almost crunchy cotton feel. Not the silky Egyptian or sateen, warm finish. These did not disapppoint. They felt smooth and sturdy out of the box, and soft and comfortable after one wash. They did shrink a little, and just fit our 17” mattress, but they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, crisp, cool sheets for hot climate
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit my deep mattress perfectly, and there's been no change with wash cycles - except that they've gotten even softer :) Changing from sateen weave cotton sheets to percale weave (same approximate thread count) let me quit considering turning the a/c down another notch or two. Remembering the cool, crisp percale sheets from childhood (without a/c but also not in Texas!), I looked for them - Peru Pima to the rescue! Wrinkle-free is not a characteristic I look for in a sheet, and these are no more wrinkle-prone than the sateen weave cotton sheets - it's a 100% cotton thing. Go for comfort!
customer_reviews.author: A C Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is for the 415-count version. These sheets have the nice, crisp percale feel to them and are made in Peru (not China like several other brands). They arrived quickly and beautifully packaged. They look and feel of a better quality than my percale sheets from the other company that starts with P and rhymes with shoot. Downsides are they do wrinkle out of the dryer (like most percale sheets) and the fitted sheet takes a little more effort to fit over my mattress...I have a 12-in deep queen. Overall they're very comfortable and definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: NoRedLights

customer_reviews.title: Best percale sheets
customer_reviews.text: I wish you did not use the words wrinkle free or softness because these are percale. Let’s go with coolness 5, crispness 5, and comfort 5. Quality 5. They are the best percale sheets I have found. I have bought and tried dozens of percale sheets looking for that luxury hotel feel. Theses are the best. I will be buying many more. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy a million times again.
customer_reviews.text: I like these sheets so much I felt compelled to pull up my order and write a review in the middle of the night. I’ve never liked a set of sheets so much, ever. I’ve also never bought high-quality sheets before... they are crisp, cool and soft. Not buttery soft, but firm soft, which is the perfect kind of soft in my Goldilocks world of linens.
customer_reviews.author: crobison

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a Package
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for the perfect sheets for over 5 years. Too many companies have moved to extremely soft sheets....terrible for sleeping, breathing, and turning while in bed. In other words, just plain uncomfortable. After many purchases, I've finally found my "perfect" sheet...THE 100% PERUVIAN PIMA COTTON 415 THREAD COUNT PERCALE. You win the grand prize. It sleeps like a dream, feels fantastic next to your skin, fits the mattress like a dream, and is the only sheet that found its home under our weighted blanket...HEAVEN! Please, please, please, do not discontinue these sheets. They're worth every penny and then some. 6 STARS OUT OF 5....................
customer_reviews.author: Abby Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sheets that I have ever bought. I loved them so much that I bought a second set. With both sets I received a hand written note, and with second set they arrived in a Christmas bag. The level of customer service in wonderful. How many companies include a had written note. These sheets are so soft and comfortable right out of the package. I can not say enough great things about these sheets. I highly recommend these sheets and this seller!! Mauricio also sent a nice email thanking me for both of my purchases. I was pleased to have both purchases acknowledged. Love, love, love.....
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: They feel wonderful  when you lay down.
customer_reviews.text: We really love our new sheets, we purchased two sets, blue & burgandy& they are beautiful. The feel is very nice, soft and smooth but not at all like the cheesy polyester. You pay more for quality and we think we got our moneys with with these sheets. They are very nice and maybe the best sheets we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Art S. in FL

customer_reviews.title: Sheets that feel crisp, cool and luxurious.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite sheets so far. They appear a bit wrinkled naturally but who cares. They have weight to them but feel instantly cool when moving underneath the covers. No unnecessary sweating at night. Will be purchasing another set for my boyfriend’s place because the difference in quality is so noticeable. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Washington

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cool
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets - nice and cool to the touch, which is exactly what I was looking for! I was concerned when they felt scratchy coming out of the wash for the first time, but then I learned that this is very common with brand new sheets. It is not an accurate indication of how the sheets will feel long-term, but rather is a result of the manufacturing process when the sheets are made, and a quick Google search reveals that there are tricks to getting sheets feeling soft right off the bat (e.g. adding a cup of baking soda to the washing machine, adding some vinegar to the rinse cycle, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: P & A Woods

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely fussy on sheets and these are the best I've ever purchased. They are very soft with a crisp feel and you can feel the quality. I know these will last a long time, however I ordered another set so I know I'll have them. They will wrinkle after washing and drying, however the wrinkles disappeared a day after I put them back on my bed. By the way, they even include a hand signed thank you note! Please keep making them and keep the quality!
customer_reviews.author: M. Trombley

customer_reviews.title: not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: These sheets have too low of a thread count to justify the price and description of this product. And because they are sheets you have to wash them a few times to realize they just aren't as soft as described but of course at that point too late to return them. Reached out to the seller to express my concern and received no response to date. Do not recommend buying at this price - these should be priced at half ($45ish) to accurately reflect their quality.
customer_reviews.author: PC Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars on softness because these are crisp percale. Only washed once I believe they will soften in time. Lovely and breathable. Someone gave a low review stating they felt like plastic. They did feel like that before washing first time. I believe they have a great deal of sizing (starch) in them. After washing they felt great ( nothing beats cotton). Going to buy another set for the guest room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy weight percale sheet set.
customer_reviews.text: These Pima Peru 100% pima cotton sheets are just what we were looking for. They’re a nice heavy weight cotton percale sheet set. As with all good quality percale sheets they are crisp not a silky soft slippery feeling sheet. Being a percale knit yes they wrinkle after washing but I love the substance and feel of percale and these are great imo. Fit my 14” thick mattress like a glove. I don’t think I’ve ever seen a nicer packaged sheet set and the personal note included from the company is a nice touch.. if you like percale sheets these punch well above their price point for quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: really nice sheets. they are more substantial than most sheets ...
customer_reviews.text: really nice sheets. they are more substantial than most sheets yet are soft. The fitted sheet is still a little big for my mattress that is 9 inches thick but I'm sure as I wash it there will be some shrinkage. The pillowcases are generously sized as well for my thick but standard length pillows. Would buy again. Would love to buy more pillow covers if they sold them seperately.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit the mattress well
customer_reviews.text: I really hoped spending some extra money for a good set of sheets would pay off but these have fallen short. They come off the bed every single night and don’t fit my queen at all. I have a pretty standard queen mattress that I’ve never had problems with sheets coming off before. Their construction is nothing above average, and for the price not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: drenee3

customer_reviews.title: Like Old Fashioned Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and comfortable. Wash like my mom's when I was a kid, and come in off the line just like hers too, the feel and the smell of them!
customer_reviews.author: L. Neumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets - poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the feel of these sheets and bought king sets on three separate occasions, most recently in May 2020. Unfortunately, the stitching is defective on the seams on the long edges of the flat sheets. As a result the piece of cloth I think is called a selvedge tears off the sheet after a few washings. So far, the flat sheet from the set I bought in May is OK, but the selvedge on the other flat sheets have completely torn off. Bottom line - very nice sheets but very poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ilisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I received my sheets in a beautiful package including a handwritten note 10 days before my new mattress arrived. I washed them before use as suggested and they felt a little rough to my hands, but I have found these sheets to be everything advertised. I love sleeping in them and the sound they make then I rustle the sheets. My only regret is the inability to buy extra pillow cases, but I understand they plan to offer them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mc

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice percale sheets that are crisp and fit a queen 10" deep mattress without buckling or excess shifting. The downside is that they are a bit thinly weaved and are not exactly as soft as the reviews suggest. I'm hoping with time and washing they will soften up some. Overall satisfied with the quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: KateAtTheBeach

customer_reviews.title: Sheet Snob Approved
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY picky about my sheets, and I ADORE these sheets. I won’t use anything else. They are super soft and a joy to sleep on. The material feels luxurious and not at all cheap. I bought two sets about six months ago and they’ve held up very well - they feel exactly the same as when I first bought them. I couldn’t recommend these more!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: repeat HAPPY customer - great percale sheets
customer_reviews.text: I liked my first set of Peru Pima sheets -- after using them for over a year and I had to have another set so both bedrooms have them. I sleep so well on these sheets! I actually never thought it mattered that much till I had Peru Pima on my bed. Now, they do wrinkle as they are 100% cotton percale. I could press them, but why bother. They are soft, crisp and cool.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hit gold!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! Fits exceptionally well, launders beautifully, very comfortable. I’m very fussy about my sheets and can rarely find great sheets. Hit the jackpot with these! They are 100% cotton so they usually don’t wear as long as mixed fabrics, but I’m ok with that. Maybe they’ll surprise me!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very nice. The sheets aren't particularly "heavy", but they have a nice feel even in the cool weather that we are having. I ironed the pillow cases and they are soft, smooth and lovely. I would recommend them and will probably buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not great, the stitching is already coming loose on the pillowcases and I’ve only owned these sheets for a few weeks. Incredibly overpriced. Maybe only worth $30. Would not purchase again and would recommend others avoid buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 sets of California king white. I am very picky about cotton sheets. The expectation far exceeds. I am a sheet bleacher and the first set is just as nice as my newest set. I like fresh cotton sheets highly comfort and cool, they are that. If you like a comfortable cool sheets with a nice thread count these are it. They aren’t wrinkle free as they are not combed cotton but COTTON... like an expensive cotton shirt you’ll need to iron them, I have a bedspread and I don’t iron.😁
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy sheets, but very scratchy.
customer_reviews.text: While these sheets feel substantial and are not flimsy in any way, they feel surprisingly scratchy. I purchased these based upon the positive reviews and am pretty disappointed. I'm glad that I only purchased one set instead of the 2 sets that I originally set out to do. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Used them for the 1st time last night
customer_reviews.text: I was worried them were going to be a little too crisp, but they were perfect. They were soft, not like microfiber, but they were nice and seemed well made. I like the big wide stripes for some reason. Pretty.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pretty color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets for a guest room. They came beautifully packaged and the prettiest color of gray! They are so soft and washed well. They wrinkled a little but that s ok; it was important to me to have cotton because I live in Georgia and it is hot. I can’t wait to have company sleep on them! I’m thinking of buying a set for my bed!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets I’ve ever had and that’s speaking of over 50 years. Love the softness and comfy feel. They wash well and are generous with the deep pocket on fitted sheet. Doesn’t matter that they are not wrinkle free. I sleep in them comfortably, that’s what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ann Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my new sheets! I immediately laundered them, ironed the fold over portion of the top sheet and the pillow cases. Then put them on my new bed. Happy, happy!! They fit perfectly...tight corners and nice overhang. I'm 85 years old and haven't enjoyed my sheets for many years. I plan to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality What definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's a little wrinkly It's soft enough and as advertised that as it gets washed it become softer Hopefully that is true No matter what I love the sheets it feels like I'm in a hotel fresh white crispy sheets wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for a couple of months now. Smooth, comfortable, and no pilling after repeated washings. The fit is tight as well to the mattress. ...Ahhhhh...at last...good sheets, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great old fashioned feel.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these sheets a 5 star rating IF the fitted sheet had a deeper pocket. It just barely fits my mattress but so far has not slipped off. I washed and dried them upon receipt due to the bad smell but had no shrinkage or dryer problems and no lingering smell. Would recommend deeper pockets and wider elastic on fitted sheet in future but I would definitely buy again just for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Percale Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous. Like the sheets of my childhood, when Mom hung everything on the clothesline. They're very crisp and much thicker than I expected. Yes, they wrinkle but I put them on the bed right out of the dryer, smooth them, and they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Suber

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Only been sleeping on them for a moth s I can’t speak to durability yet but the feel is everything I was looking for in a sheet. It’s smooth but not silky. Substantial but not heavy. Never makes me feel hot. I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sheets feel cool to the touch no matter the temperature of the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually review products, but in this case, I am eager to share my experience and opinion. I am at the tail end of hormone theory for my prostrate and a side effect is night sweats. These sheets keep their cool all night and have allowed me to sleep through my night sweats.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: cool and crisp
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are lovely, cool and crisp...they launder nicely and feel great year round. The reason I am giving them 3 stars is because it has barely been a year and the elastic corners are already giving out. I have to fix the bottom sheet every morning, which is a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Parker
